title: Miami South Beach Glam near Art Deco District with Daily Dining Credit
description:
Get swept up in the electric energy of South Beach at this stylish hotel nestled along Collins Canal, just steps from Miami's white sands and iconic hotspots. Spend your days sun-soaking on the beach, exploring the Art Deco District or restaurant and bar hopping through the city’s legendary nightlife - all within easy reach of your retro-inspired oasis.

Indulge in Latin-inspired flavours at Tambo, best paired with handcrafted margaritas amid the buzzing atmosphere. When you need a break from the action, cool off with a cocktail in hand at the palm-fringed outdoor pool or unwind with a wellness treatment by K'Alma Spas, delivered in the comfort of your room.
offer_address: 2360 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, Florida 33139, United States

title: Five-Star Miami Beach Retreat in Edec Roc Complex with Private NOBU Pool, World-Class Restaurant & Spa
description: Kick back and relax at the stylish Nobu Hotel Miami Beach - a five-star beach retreat where boho beach flair meets modern glam in the heart of one of Florida's most sought-after neighbourhoods. Part of the renowned Eden Roc hotel complex, you'll enjoy access to all of its iconic amenities, including three swimming pools, a spacious spa and, of course, beach service so you can meditate to the sound of rolling waves and wake up a few short steps from the golden sands of Miami Beach. Spend your days at the private NOBU pool with a signature cocktail from Pool & Beach Bar, which provides all-day outdoor dining. Feel like a VIP at Nobu Miami, where you can dine among Hollywood royalty at the famed restaurant inspired by Chef Nobu Matsuhisa’s world-famous Japanese and Latin-American fusion cuisine.

title: Stunning Miami Harbourside Stay with Rooftop Pool
description: Watch as the sun dips below the sparkling Miami waterfront with a harbourside stay at Kimpton Hotel Palomar South Beach. With prime city centre positioning, exploring the city's dining, shopping and cultural attractions is a breeze. Enjoy the shimmer of the city lights on the waters below from the rooftop pool, or indulge in soulful Italian fare and fine wine overlooking the harbour at the hotel’s own Osteria Morini.
offer_address: 1750 Alton Road, Miami Beach, Florida 33139, United States

title: Oceanfront South Beach Miami Stay with Onsite Spa
description: Experience the best of Miami from your beachfront oasis at Kimpton Surfcomber Hotel, a fun-filled stay dripping with Art Deco charisma just steps from the Atlantic Ocean. Enjoy rejuvenating spa treatments at your fingertips, or indulge in private pool cabanas and curated DAYLIFE activities. Dine under the stars at High Tide Beach Bar and Grill, and sip craft cocktails at The Social Club while lapping up the South Beach sun.
location_description: Kimpton Surfcomber Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1717 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, Florida 33139, United States

title: Oceanfront Miami Beach Art Deco Escape with Restaurants, Pool & Day Spa
description: Discover a laidback haven of coastal style nestled in the heart of Miami with a stay at the Nautilus Sonesta Miami Beach. This Art Deco gem, steps from the bustling Collins Avenue, offers unparalleled access to Miami's most coveted attractions. Indulge in delicious dining at the hotel’s own Nautilus Cabana Club, explore the eclectic boutiques of Lincoln Road, or simply bask in the sun along the stunning beach. As the sun sets, unwind with a cocktail by the pool.
offer_address: 1825 Collins Avenue, Miami Beach, Florida 33139, United States

title: Miami Beachfront Bliss with Three Glistening Pools, Beachfront Cabanas & Wellness Centre
description:
Stay in the heart of Miami's vibrant mid-beach neighbourhood at the contemporary Eden Roc Miami Beach. First built in 1955, the hotel attracts the curious and culturally minded to experience its timeless style, nostalgic glamour and world-class facilities. Just steps from the golden sands of Miami Beach, and minutes away from high-end boutiques, buzzing bars, restaurants and museums, it couldn't be better placed for days spent in the sun.

You'll be spoilt for choice with three beachfront pools - take your pick of lounger or cabana and get comfortable - frozen drinks or an ice-cold classic cocktail will soon be on the way. Cool off with a dip before diving into a spread of snacks courtesy of Aquatica Bar, or dry off to visit Ocean Social, where coastal dining is delivered in classic Miami style, or the iconic Nobu Miami. Retreat to the deluxe Esencia Wellness Spa for a luxurious escape for mind and body, or explore the beach and its surrounds by bike.

title: Super-Stylish Miami South Beach Escape with Glamorous Pool
description: Let the good times roll with a stay at The Goodtime Hotel, a pastel-pink, party-loving palace positioned at the heart of Miami’s bustling, breezy-bohemian South Beach neighbourhood. Brought to you by renowned musician Pharrell Williams, this hotel is quickly becoming a Miami icon - enjoy modern Mediterranean bites and sumptuous cocktails at Strawberry Moon, or laze by the hotel’s glamorous pool, host of the weekend’s hippest DJ-spun pool parties.
offer_address: 601 Washington Ave, Miami Beach, FL 33139, USA
